column4: Hi, I want to make a command-line live CD with a few custom scripts. What is the most recommended way of doing that? Any ideas?
What if I want to make a live image (exact copy) of my installation.
similar to what this tool does: http://www.linux-live.org/
http://www.gnu.org/software/ddrescue/ddrescue.html  Its a GNU program that uses dd. It can create a full disk image.
